Hero.title: DiMiTo - Real-World Mining Meets Web3
Hero.description: Participate in future net profits of real mining projects without direct ownership complexities. Global access, complete transparency, high liquidity.

about.title: What Is DiMiTo?
about.description: DiMiTo platform provides a connection between traditional mining and decentralized finance. Through tokenization of mining revenue streams, we enable fractional participation in future net profits of mining projects without the complexities of direct ownership.

globalAccess.title: Reduced Entry Barriers
globalAccess.description: Eliminating legal restrictions, high capital requirements and geographical barriers of traditional mining investments

fullTransparency.title: Real-time Reporting
fullTransparency.description: Transparent reporting system for capital allocation, construction progress, operational costs and profitability

realSupport.title: Legal Guarantees
realSupport.description: Mine owners are required to provide valid licenses, feasibility studies and enforceable collateral

projects.title: DiMiTo Mining Projects
projects.description: Each DiMiTo token represents a specific share of future net profits from one or more verified and licensed mining projects.

roadmap.title: Project Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our strategic plan to revolutionize mining investments through blockchain technology.

items.platformDesc: Complete development of DiMiTo platform with smart contracts, user interface, and security audits.
items.presalesDesc: Launch of structured presale events for DMT tokens with transparent pricing and community access.
items.transparencyDesc: Launch a comprehensive transparency platform that delivers financial reports and operational insights to ensure full investor transparency.
items.marketDesc: Launch dedicated secondary market and exchange listings for DiMiTo tokens with enhanced liquidity.
items.miningDesc: Begin actual mining operations and start profit distribution to token holders through smart contracts.
items.expansionDesc: Scale operations globally, add new mining projects, and expand the DiMiTo ecosystem.

features.title: Features
items: Each token represents a share of mine profits

profitability.title: Profitability & Value Creation
profitability.description: Mine profits are injected directly into the market instead of cash dividends:

markets.title: Primary & Secondary Markets
markets.description: Two complementary markets for optimal access and liquidity

features.title: Features
items: Transparent presale recorded in smart contract
Fast buy/sell capability in DEX with initial liquidity
Secondary market for custom price trading

features.title: Guarantees
items: Display of costs, project progress and profitability
Legal commitments and collateral for mine owners

whyBlockchain.title: Why Blockchain Technology?
whyBlockchain.subtitle: Discover how blockchain revolutionizes mining investments with transparency, security, and global accessibility.

benefits.transparencyDesc: Every transaction and profit distribution is recorded on the blockchain, providing full visibility and accountability for all stakeholders.
benefits.smartContractsDesc: Automated profit distribution through smart contracts ensures fair and timely payments without intermediaries or delays.
benefits.resistanceDesc: Blockchain's immutable nature protects against fraud, corruption, and manipulation, ensuring your investments remain secure.
benefits.globalAccessDesc: Access mining investments from anywhere in the world, 24/7, without geographical restrictions or traditional banking limitations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about DiMiTo and DMT tokens

buyTokens.question: How can I participate in presales?
buyTokens.answer: DMT tokens are released through structured presale events. All supply is distributed only through presales, ensuring complete transparency and market-based pricing.

tokenValue.question: How does token value increase?
tokenValue.answer: Profits from mining operations are used in three ways to strengthen token value: buying back tokens from the open market, injecting liquidity at higher prices, and market making in the secondary market.

tokenValue2.question: Do token holders have operational responsibilities?
tokenValue2.answer: No. Token buyers have no operational or legal obligations regarding mining activities. Token ownership means participation in future net benefits, not shares or ownership in the mines.

tokenValue3.question: How is operational transparency guaranteed?
tokenValue3.answer: A dedicated reporting module on the website provides real-time and historical views of each mine token's financial and operational performance, capital allocation methods, and profitability details.

tokenValue4.question: Can I sell my tokens?
tokenValue4.answer: Yes. Immediately after presale, two markets are available: initial liquidity pool for instant trading, and secondary on-chain order book market for custom price trading.

tokenValue5.question: What guarantees exist for investor protection?
tokenValue5.answer: Mine owners are required to provide valid licenses, feasibility studies, expert reports, and collateral equivalent to 2.5 times the funding amount, which is held under platform supervision.

hero.title: DiMiTo Whitepaper
hero.subtitle: Complete technical documentation and economic model of the blockchain-based mining investment platform

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: DiMiTo is an innovative platform that bridges the traditional mining world with blockchain technology. Using smart contracts and complete transparency, we provide mining investment opportunities for everyone.

0.title: Complete Transparency
0.description: All transactions and reports are recorded in real-time on the blockchain

1.title: Legal & Compliant
1.description: All projects have valid licenses and legal guarantees

2.title: Easy Access
2.description: Participate in mining projects without traditional barriers

technical.title: Technical Specifications
technical.description: DiMiTo is built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchain and follows ERC-20 standards to ensure high security and efficiency.

tokenomics.title: Economic Model
tokenomics.description: DiMiTo's economic structure is designed to ensure the interests of all stakeholders and guarantee the long-term sustainability of the project.

legal.title: Legal Framework
legal.description: DiMiTo complies with all relevant laws and regulations and has established a comprehensive legal framework to protect investor rights.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Phased planning for the implementation and development of the DiMiTo platform in four main phases

0.title: Phase 1: Structured Presale
0.description: Launch DMT token presale with transparent and trackable structure

1.title: Phase 2: Infrastructure Development
1.description: Creation and development of mining refining and extraction infrastructure

2.title: Phase 3: Secondary Market
2.description: Activation of secondary market and start of profit distribution

3.title: Phase 4: Complete Transparency
3.description: Implementation of real-time reporting and complete transparency
